Average spawn rate of this pokemon here is:
App will not work without GPS :(

Welcome to my bootcamp - competition Pokemon Map!
 
 It has map with location, that can be saved on list via button or map-click, it has real - time database to store saved location online, user can move and delete items on list via gestures - database keeps order information, images available on add-place screen are downloaded from REST API that is (almost) up to date andâ€¦ there is still a lot of bugs to fix.
 
 But I hope you enjoy it as I did writing this little thing.
 
 Best Regards!
